wishlist.description: When gift ideas are running low
wishlist.selfhosteddescription: Your wishes, your server. Keep your data private and under your control.
wishlist.sharecarefullydescription: One list per admin. Zero complexity. Start multiple instances for different family members using different ports or subdomains.
wishlist.staysimpledescription: No ads, no notifications, no complexity. Just lists of things you'd like.
wishlist.purchaseDescription: Do you really want to get {item}? It will no longer be possible to cancel your decision.
wishlist.priorityHighToLow: Sort by priority: high priority first
wishlist.priorityLowToHigh: Sort by priority: low priority first
wishlist.priceHighToLow: Sort by price: most expensive first
wishlist.priceLowToHigh: Sort by price: least expensive first
wishlist.showPurchased: Show items that have already been gifted
wishlist.switchTheme: Switch between light and dark mode

admin.addWishDescription: Add a new wish to your list
